original_title: Busch singt – Sechs Filme über die erste Hälfte des 20. Jahrhunderts
overview: "Busch singt" consists of 6 films "About the first part of our century" and does not present Ernst Busch only as a singer but is a film with and about Busch as a chronicler and fighter for communist ideals of his time. Konrad Wolf died during the production, he directed part 3 "1935 oder Das Faß der Pandora" and part 5 "Ein Toter auf Urlaub".
title: Busch singt – Sechs Filme über die erste Hälfte des 20. Jahrhunderts
